description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2021/01808/FUL dated 8th April 2022 for the "Erection of 3no. dormer windows to replace existing rooflights to the front roofslope; erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition; installation of French doors with Juliette balconies to the rear elevation at first and second floor levels; replacement and reconstruction of side elevation to match existing; erection of a single storey rear extension to side and rear of rebuilt back addition; excavation of part of the front and rear gardens to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement extension;  erection of an external staircase from proposed basement to the rear garden; erection of a new boundary wall with railings on top; erection of a bin store in the front garden; installation of photovoltaic panels on upper level flat roofs; and replacement of existing windows to match appearance of existing sash windows."  Amendment sought is the omission of glazing to rear lightwell side wall at basement level.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
